title: [Widow's Beach, Sandbar]
description: The sandbar continues outward, the way at times partially submerged and treacherous.  Attempting to thrive in their mostly moist environment, assorted plants thrust upwards toward the sky.  A large atoll crests the waterline in the distance.

The sandbar continues outward, sometimes partially submerged, sometimes above the water.  Assorted plants attempting to thrive in their mostly moist environment stand upright.  A large atoll crests the waterline in the distance.
